mapper.select: select count(*) from orders where `bus` = #{busId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and `date` = curdate() and `status` = '2'
select count(*) from orders where `bus` = #{busId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and `date` = curdate() and (`status` = '1' or `status` = '2')
select count(*) from orders where `order_id` = #{orderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and `date` = curdate() and `status` = '1'

SELECT order_id, bus_id, bus_date, U.user_name as user_name, verify_time FROM (SELECT bus_id, bus_date, driver FROM tickets) AS T JOIN orders O ON T.bus_id = O.bus AND T.bus_date = O.`date` JOIN sys_user AS U ON O.user_id = U.user_id WHERE O.`status` = '2' AND T.bus_id = #{busId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT B.bus_id as bus_id, S.station_name as `start`, E.station_name as `dest`, T.bus_date as bus_date, start_time, end_time as dest_time FROM (SELECT bus_id, bus_date, driver FROM tickets WHERE bus_date = CURDATE()) AS T JOIN sys_user D ON D.user_id = T.driver JOIN bus B ON B.bus_id = T.bus_id JOIN station S ON S.station_id = B.`start` JOIN station E ON E.station_id = B.`dest` WHERE D.user_name = #{driver, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
